User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Block crawling of .md extension URLs
Disallow: /*.md

# Block redirect pages (these are auto-generated by Astro redirects)
# Using trailing slashes for consistency with trailingSlash: 'always' config
Disallow: /ambi-alert/
Disallow: /blog/2019-05-29-pipenv-pyenv/
Disallow: /blog/ml-fragmentation-redirect/
Disallow: /blog/ml-fragmentation-2/
Disallow: /blog/full-stack-ml-3/

# Block partytown directory
Disallow: /~partytown/

# Block query parameter URLs
Disallow: /*?cat=*
Disallow: /*?*

# Block any URL patterns that might cause duplicates
Disallow: /*?page=*
Disallow: /*/page/*

# Block URLs without trailing slashes to prevent duplicate content
# (These will auto-redirect to trailing slash versions)
Disallow: /blog
Disallow: /projects
Disallow: /verses
Disallow: /podcasts

Sitemap: https://prassanna.io/sitemap-index.xml
